sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The UnZip package contains unzip , funzip, unzipfsx, zipgrep and zipinfo.

sect3.title: unzip
sect3.para: unzip lists, tests or extracts files from a ZIP archive.

sect3.title: funzip
sect3.para: funzip allows the output of unzip commands to be redirected.

sect3.title: unzipfsx
sect3.para: unzipfsx is the self-extracting stub that can be prepended to a ZIP archive. Files in this format allow the recipient to decompress the archive without installing UnZip.

sect3.title: zipgrep
sect3.para: zipgrep is a grep for ZIP archives.

sect3.title: zipinfo
sect3.para: zipinfo produces technical information about the files in a ZIP archive, including file access permissions, encryption status, type of compression, etc.
